events.message: I received the wrong product in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been classified under the Refund category based on the customer's request for money back.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received as well as your order number to help us process the refund?
Here are the photos of the incorrect product I received along with my order number 123456789.
Thank you for the info. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the refund being processed promptly.
The refund has been approved and is now being processed. Please allow a few days for the transaction to reflect in your account.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the refund. Please contact us if you need further assistance.
We are closing this case as the refund process has been completed and no further issues have been reported.
